email_content:
Hi there,

Hope you’re doing well. Following our recent conversations, I’m sharing NexTech’s high-level requirements and timeline for the new Performance Tracking System:

1. Core Functionality
   • Real-time metrics: Project completion rates, sales target progress, service response times.
   • Customizable dashboards: End-users should be able to select the KPIs most relevant to their roles.
   • HRIS integration: Seamless data exchange with our existing HR system to keep performance data and employee records in sync.

2. Security & Privacy
   • Role-based access controls.
   • Data encryption in transit and at rest.
   • Compliance with all applicable data-protection regulations.

3. Implementation Timeline
   • Development kickoff: early next quarter.
   • Internal pilot: about six months after kickoff, incorporating user feedback before wider rollout.

4. Deliverables
   • Technical architecture overview.
   • Integration plan with HRIS.
   • Prototype dashboards for key user groups.
   • Testing and training plan.

Please confirm these points align with your team’s current understanding and let us know if you need additional information. We’d also appreciate a brief project plan outlining milestones and resource needs ahead of our next sync call.

Thank you for your partnership. Looking forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
Jane
Human Resources Management Advisor
NexTech Solutions
